concept.definition: The cancer is a new primary
The cancer is a regional (local) recurrence
The cancer is a distant metastases

description: Indicates whether a new primary cancer or a regional recurrence or distant metastases.
name: NehtaCancerPrimaryOrRecurrence

text.div:
NehtaCancerPrimaryOrRecurrence

Indicates whether a new primary cancer or a regional recurrence or distant metastases.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-cancer-primary-or-recurrence defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
new_primary New primaryThe cancer is a new primary
local_recurrence Regional (local) recurrenceThe cancer is a regional (local) recurrence
distant_metastases Distant metastasesThe cancer is a distant metastases
